original: intros f m1 m2 H. induction f. - simpl. apply subAllTerm_ext. intros. apply H. simpl. apply H0. - simpl. apply subAllTerms_ext. intros. apply H. simpl. apply H0. - simpl. rewrite IHf1. rewrite IHf2. reflexivity. apply H. intros. apply H0. apply H. intros. apply H0. - simpl. rewrite IHf. reflexivity. apply H. intros. apply H0. - simpl. f_equal. apply IHf. intros. apply H. apply in_or_app. simpl in H0. destruct (in_app_or _ _ _ _ (H0)) as [H1|H1]. * left. apply H1. * right. destruct H1. contradiction. apply H1.
